description: squat circular body on a raised flared foot, cylindrical neck, high arching handle with solid dark glaze; green-grey glaze on spout; body, neck and cover glazed with a spotted pattern in bands growing larger in size from neck and foot toward body at center
dimension: H.7-1/4 x W.8 x D.5-5/8 in. (overall)
life_date: American (Alfred, New York and Houston, Minnesota), born 1960
title: Covered Teapot
